description: A Tile-Matching Puzzle Dice Game, only on Playdate.

name: Covert Critter
description: Covert Critter is a top-down sneaking game and retro throwback to stealth titles of the mid to late 90's. As elite agent Koss, your goal is to navigate through each of the 10 unique stages, all while remaining silent and out of the enemy's sight. The terrorist group known as the Red Hawks are vigilant creatures, armed to the beak, and around every corner of the facility.

name: Impact Space
description: Simple Arcade Shooter for the Playdate

name: Knockbots
description: Sin descripción

name: Planitis
description: The universe needs order!

name: In the Grass
description: A little game no one should play.

name: Babe or Grave
description: Babe or be graved

name: To Libertad
description: A short story of a slave and her journey to freedom

name: We don't die here
description: An unknown enemy has descended on your world. Population decimated from 10 billion to a little over 100 survivors. This is your extinction event. You, Empress Asa, refuse to accept this. But, you are about to be overrun...

name: Amazin' George 2: Digital Deluxe
description: More cat and maze and JRPG fun! We've updated George and his friend's appearence to look even cuter and more realistic than ever.

name: City Super Hero 3D: Flying Legend Warriors Deluxe Simulator
description: Get strong and agile to become the best super hero of the city! Fight criminals and villains to keep the citizens of the city safe!Explore a large and modern metropolis!

name: Japanese Escape Games: The Retro House
description: "Japanese Escape Games :The Retro House" is a mystery, adventure games. Point the screen with a cursor to solve riddles.

name: My Cute Unicorns: Coloring Book
description: They are so cute, try to color this amazing creatures!

name: Whack First!: Fight the Moles
description: The moles are trying to destroy the farm. Use your hammer to hit them and save the infected crop. Get the highest scores and take on your friends.

name: Apathy: Napoli no Otoko-tachi in Gakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi
description: Sin descripción

name: Cruxade
description: Inspired by Pen and Paper and Souls-Like combat. Cruxade is a anime-styled Fantasy Action Adventure Role-Playing Game, with the ability to choose between a solo or multiplayer experience.

name: Revival AO
description: Revival AO is an online RPG based in a medieval fantasy world.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Pro Train - TGV Duplex
description: The TGV Duplex is a French high-speed train of the TGV family, manufactured by Alstom, and operated by the French national railway company SNCF. It is unique among TGV trains in that it features bi-level carriages. The Duplex inaugurated the third generation of TGV trainsets.

name: Trainz Plus: Pro Train - TGV Duplex
description: The TGV Duplex is a French high-speed train of the TGV family, manufactured by Alstom, and operated by the French national railway company SNCF. It is unique among TGV trains in that it features bi-level carriages. The Duplex inaugurated the third generation of TGV trainsets.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Paris
description: Puzzles of Paris!

name: Exodus
description: Exodus, a realtime strategy PC game featuring stunning photorealistic graphics, oldschool RTS gameplay mechanics mixed with our own fresh ideas and a thrilling horror infused story about a dystopian alternative timeline of human history.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Anime 4
description: Awesome anime images provided by Studio Ghibli, directly from their movies.

name: Anvil Life
description: In this game that offers unlimited fun in Singleplayer, Sandbox game type; You will be able to upgrade your items, expand your military, win loot with quests, and try many combinations to bring the characters to the state you want.

name: Space Trucker
description: Space Trucker is a "realistic" space simulator where you fly your cargo ship to different places within the solar system. Configure you ship, maneuver for departing and docking, plan your high speed flight, and execute it all without breaking space rules - or killing yourself!

name: Presentable Liberty Remake
description: In the midst of a pandemic you are imprisoned and alone in a cell. You cannot escape this cell. All you can hear day in and day out is the ticking of the clock in your cell. You may still receive letters, but you cannot reply to them.

name: Puppeteer
description: Following a challenge, 5 friends decided to enter an abandoned school, after entering the school, they realized that they made the biggest mistake of their lives.

name: The Sentinel Remake
description:
Welcome to Sentinel Island, a place where the modern world collides with primal forces under the tyrannical rule of Wandal. As a modern man, you must navigate this wild landscape, crafting tools of science to survive against the relentless tribe. Use strategy to outsmart brutal enemies and master immersive mechanics while uncovering dark secrets hidden in the shadows and Bill Black's past.

As you explore the island, confront the remnants of your past and grapple with the question of what 'true civilization' really means. The Sentinel Remake is a first-person survival horror and immersive sim game that brings the character Bill Black to life. Help him navigate various challenges, interact with diverse inhabitants, and unveil the mysteries of his dark history.

In The Sentinel Remake, solve problems in your own way, using your unique strategy. Choose stealth to evade enemies, craft tools for defense, or distract them to create an opening.

Prepare for a struggle between modernity and primal chaos—your journey begins now!

name: Colorful
description: Colorful is a hack-n-slash that combines acrobatic freeform movement with fast-paced combat. You wake up in an unknown lifeless world where strange shadow creatures have consumed its color.

name: Wars Across the World: Sepoy 1857
description: Sepoy 1857 accounts for the great Indian Mutiny, a major uprising in India in 1857–58 against the rule of the British East India Company, which functioned as a sovereign power on behalf of the British Crown.

name: Train Simulator: Union Pacific Heavy Challenger Steam Loco
description: The last decades of the steam era in America produced many of the largest, best, and most extraordinary locomotives ever to grace steel rails – and among these landmark locomotives was Union Pacific’s magnificent 3900-class 4-6-6-4 “Challenger.”

name: Presence
description: Presence is a 2D tile based strategy game with RogueLike Elements. Explore randomly generated levels as you battle your way in a fierce turn based combat system. Gather loot and gain XP to ascend the Classes to gain ever more power.

name: Fast Food Shop Online
description: Go solo or invite your friends to run the fast food shop at your town! Survive, upgrade shop , buy farm and vehicles , and more!

name: Shadows on the Vatican: Act III - Sloth
description: The intrigue continues, as American doctor James Murphy and the professional assassin Silvia join forces to expose the members of a conspiracy that leads all the way to the highest levels of the Catholic Church before they’re silenced forever for what they know.

name: TS!Underswap
description: An unofficial fan-game of Toby Fox's Undertale. Explore a re-imagined world based on the premise of swapping character roles, and adding original content, to create new scenarios.

name: Just Survival: The Zombie Awakening
description: Just Survival: The Zombie Awakening is an Early Access Version of an Open World Post-Apocalyptic Zombie Survival Game. This game immerses you in a unique Earth as humanity is fighting back & teaming up to take back control of the infected zombie hordes!

name: Otherworld Legends: Ebonfang
description:
This content requires the base game Otherworld Legends in order to play.

A youthful martial combatant armed with throwing spikes who utilizes her blazing speed to unleash withering volleys of steel upon her foes from the air. She is apparently the co-owner of a strange mirror that grants passage to a number of different worlds, and has fallen into the illusory realm created by Asurendra during a training tour alongside her sister.

name: Velaster
description: Velaster is a gruesome 2.5D side-scrolling action combat game set in the Middle-earth called Malum. You will find yourself growing in battles against various monsters and bosses. Take revenge that remains in your fading memories.

name: Metro MP
description: Visit all points of known and unknown metro stations, take tasks, collect any tin that catches your eye. Do not forget about the food that will go to you for a single dinner, because you will have no time to eat in this world.

name: SCP: The Paranormal
description: SCP: The Paranormal puts you in the shoes of Agent Spring, a rookie S.C.P agent who's job is to investigate and fight the paranormal after the world has fallen to these paranormal creatures. Investigate strange paranormal SCP's in this SCP Foundation based indie game.

name: VRealistic Fight: Aim For the Chest
description: A casual multiplayer pvp game where you can incapacitate your opponents and get a bigger advantage over them.

name: Gun Blade
description: Sin descripción

name: Hey Stranger! I Dare You to Love Me!
description: In this saucy 2D visual novel, you find yourself in a strange new town in which all of its residents are promiscuous and eager to get to know the newcomer! The story will depend entirely on your own choices. Will you give in to passion and accept the locals' blatant advances?

name: Horny Witch Hunt
description: Once in a generation a mage is born who is so powerful they can't be beaten by ordinary force, they are called nymphomages, and they get their force by sucking the life out of other people through sexual acts. You are the only last living nymphomage, and the whole world is against you.

name: Taste of Seduction
description: Taste Of Seduction is a 3D high-quality, first-person, story and dialogue-driven RPG adult game that blends together themes such as college life and that of a spy adventure.

name: Hot Cam
description: Nancy wants to share her naughty and cute pictures, but she is a shy girl. She needs your help!

name: Hentai Cast: Podcast Simulator
description: Record your audience's lewd stories while you Make choices about them to raise your podcast popularity. Manage your money, Buy equipment, Make ad campaigns and Receive emails with the sexual adventures of your fans. Play a simulation game with visual novel features in which choices matter.

name: Milk Girl: Sweet Memories of Summer
description: Adventure game of living together with a girl with mother milk in summer. You can move a pedestrian, talk to a girl, researching, earn money. Enjoy living together!

name: No Skirt Convenience Shop
description: In “Convenience Store Without Skirts” story, a 29 years old single male Duanmuyi, after traveling around the world, he back to his hometown – The Center City. To fulfill his foster mother’s dying wish, he spend all his money to run a convenience store and become a shop manage man.

name: ShadoWave
description: Shadow Wave is a Metroidvania-style action rogue lite. Explore different biomes always with different arrangements. With the help of your faithful companion, move fast, be precise in combat and watch your powers grow stronger. Evolve in death and enjoy the path.

name: TruLove
description: TruLove is a visual novel with just a dash of stat raising. The game takes you through one complete college year, with changing seasons, college exams, and of course the all important holidays. Oh, and don’t forget dates with the girl of your choice!

name: Witch Girl Got Killed
description: Witch Girl Got Killed is a first-person fantasy horror action game. You are a magical girl trainee. Use magic and destroy the labyrinth while running away from monsters.

name: Gossamer
description: You will get started in the school and encounter unexplained phenomena such as classmates who do not exist in the reality, but they have been recorded in your diary, the only class that is held in the whole school and your memory which has been tampering constantly.

name: Herezh: Generations of Heroes
description: Herezh is a new multiplayer RPG/Survival hybrid game set in an immersive, procedurally generated world of Sword & Sorcery adventure inspired by Celtic myths, legends and culture.

name: Horny Punishment
description: Horny Punishment is a top-down adventure game for adults, where you are a powerful darklord who went rogue to become a farmer, but with your missing, other darklords start emerging and trying to conquer the world, so you must punish all those newcomers to try to disturb your peaceful life.

name: Hard Landing
description: An economic strategy where the player must adapt the colony to support human life on an uncharted planet. Production puzzles and unforeseen disasters await the player.

name: Zakon
description: Dear soldier, Because of your recent achievements with terrorists, your social score is high enough to give you the opportunity to to be a first pilot of our new combat jet for special operations within the motherland. Keep us proud and don't let them move.

name: Connection Lost
description: The drug infused man will stop at nothing to reach the top of building in order to get network connection in his phone . Use your phone as a weapon in a cartoony mysterious world and fire up all your enemies with a powerful flame thrower.

name: Name of the Will
description: You are informed to be a resident of Hope, a suspiciously harmonious community. Dodge the secretive governors, establish a rapport with your neighbors who monitor you, and solve puzzles to find out how you got here. Are you willing to sacrifice for the truth? Or, are you choosing a life of oblivion?

name: Atrium Malum
description: You are an ordinary member of an expedition to explore new worlds. And one day you wake up as usual. But nothing else is usual on your ship anymore.

name: Once Upon a Time... Life: Origins
description: Once Upon a Time... Life is a 2D co-op platformer meant for children and parents. The game will lead you through various places inside the human body and let you discover the secrets of its inner workings in an easy and accessible way.

name: Ragdoll Game
description: Ragdoll Game is a 10-player physics based party game with various fun game modes to play.

name: Code:Machina
description: Code:Machina is an anime-style hack and slash roguelike where the dolls of machina are designed to fight against the viruses that were destroying the cyber world.

name: Insurgence: Bloodmoon
description: Insurgence: Bloodmoon is the third entry of the Insurgence series which tells the story of Richa and her friends in Valdera, a small island rife with mysteries.

name: Clan Wars
description: Clan Wars game is a 3D turn based strategy online game combined with a fighting game one on one combat.

name: Mona
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Commander
description: The endless expanse of space has never been such a dangerous place. Take command as a Space Fleet Admiral who will face the challenge of galactic war and determine the fate of the universe.

name: Entangled
description: Relax to a story-driven puzzle platforming experience, solving puzzles using quantum entanglement. Entangle objects to find your way through a cave full of mysteries and friends. Embark on your journey through time in search of meaning in a life with no end.

name: TargetPop
description: Race the clock and aim for a highscore in this fast-paced, arcade style game! With ten themes to choose from, the way to play is yours. Climb to the top and reach 999 points where a greater challenge awaits…

name: The Silent Sky: Part I
description: The Silent Sky is a hand-drawn, point-and-click adventure game about a boy who goes wandering while searching for his dog. Without even realizing it, while under the night's silent sky, his epic journey is about to begin.

name: MMI
description: Solve puzzles, rotate the level and guide the main character to the teleport.

name: The Visit
description: The Visit puts you in control of Terry Mason, a strong minded tradesman who is vigorously a non believer when it comes to anything spiritual, after he agrees to a bet for $1,000 to stay in a haunted Manor House for 1 night, he sets off on a life changing event.

name: Demon Tomb
description: A first-person survival horror game, solve puzzles and search for supplies to arm yourself with as you explore to uncover the secrets of an old mansion. Fight, run or hide from all sorts of twisted horrors.

name: RTD: Road to Desolace
description: Explore and survive in a broken down and decaying world, set 30 years after what is known as "The Collapse"

name: Slayer: The Time of Ash and Dust
description: The time of glory has passed, and a new era has begun. Historian called this era "The time of ash and dust" A Slayer Enter the tower to save the world

name: It Lives in the Woods
description: It Lives in the Woods is a first-person psychological horror set in the forests of Canada. You are Ibrahim, a father who has recently lost his daughter whilst on a hiking trip in the forest last winter. You hope to find what happened to your daughter and whether you can reunite with her.

name: Tempo Punk
description: Can you survive in an addicting fusion of rhythm-driven FPS action and captivating dystopian action-packed storytelling? Fight for your life through cutting-edge graphics while the pulsating beats of electronic music get your brain synapses firing at highspeed.

name: Counter-Stroke: Grand Building
description: A turn-based strategy game, you need to command a squad, break down from the top of the building floor by floor, use billiard cues and the skills of soldiers to defeat the enemy until the VIP is rescued.

name: Hive
description: A tower-defence-like colony sim where you must extract resources from the land and produce fuel to escape the planet. Expand across each map researching various structures, creatively avoiding or engaging with local creatures to take their precious crystals. Research, Build, Expand, Extract!

name: Virus
description: You are a computer virus, programmed to to adapt and learn to aid in getting full access of different computers and servers. Will you be able to adapt fast enough to complete your job?

name: Radio Commander: Pacific Campaign
description: Fight against the Japanese Empire during the dire events of the Pacific War. Analyze the reports and send your orders via radio messages. Command massive fleets and aircraft squadrons at sea and on land. Change the tide of battle in non-linear gameplay - the outcome of the war is in your hands.

name: Lost in Tomorrow
description: The protagonist is an early AI robot sent to explore outer planets many years ago. When it returns to the earth after completing its mission, the earth at this time has changed. Click on the hidden props on the screen, and then drag the props in the props bar to the target position .

name: PTRL Stockcar Edition
description: PTRL Stockcar Edition is a challenging arcade racer set in a fictional racing series of the 80s

name: Super Maze Planet
description: Super Maze Planet is a relaxing Retro maze game that gives you bigger mazes as you progress through the levels. Super Maze Planet has over 900 mazes in 10 zones, with coins to pick up and characters to collect. When you earn enough gold you can unlock infinite procedural mazes too!

name: Flames of Galinor
description: A highly customizable rogue-like deck builder set in a dystopian, dark fantasy realm. Enlist the aid of 3 heroes and battle through ever-changing encounters in a rich, lore-driven world. Amass great power with each successful battle. Grow your deck to its full potential. Death is at every corner!

name: Just a Chest
description: The adventure of a hazy treasure chest, a prince without memory, a heroic slime and a cat who doesn't like her coat color.

name: Soul Maze
description: Soul Maze is a 1-2 player Horror game. Run through the mazes collecting the souls of the monsters within in order to escape before you get caught and trapped forever

name: Lost Awakening
description: A sci-fi point-and-click puzzle adventure game

name: Darkness Inside
description: Darkness Inside is a first-person atmospheric horror game. The game takes place in an old house. You will be playing the game as James, who is a paranormal investigator.

name: Gunning Over It!
description: Gunning Over It! is a highly frustrating casual game where you play as a gun trying to climb the top of the mountain to seek fame and glory!

name: Ninja Akio
description: Ninja Akio is a third person stealth game. Become a Ninja. Complete various missions, from assassinations to rescues. Before heading off on a mission you can select the gear you will take. Be as stealthy as possible to get a high ranking on each mission and unlock new gear.

name: Going Deep
description: Going Deep is a game played with a third-person view. Going Deep contains action and horror genres. using different materials you can craft/upgrade weapons, armors, knives, pouches, ammos and more

name: Harry Is A Porter
description: One day, you suddenly find yourself a porter who is driving a truck in a village. Your driving skills will be perfected after completing different tasks. When you become proficient in driving your truck, you can challenge more interesting levels.

name: Lilium Reach
description: Lilium Reach is an action adventure where you travel to a distant, forgotten region of space. Explore and collect customizable gear to aid you as you face oddities, mysteries, and danger that your life in the core systems never prepared you for.

name: Hold or Die
description: Hold or Die is a last-stand cooperative survival 3-rd person shooter where you need protect your base against hordes of mutants. Unite with other survivors. Craft barricades traps and turrets. Scavenge for resources in daytime and bring them to the base before night comes over.

name: Zombieville USA 3D
description: Welcome back to Zombieville, where arcade survival action and hilarious stylized visuals combine to eat your brains! Choose your weapons, grab a friend, and blast your way through the endless hordes!

name: Fury Fighters
description: The best beat 'em up experience with physics, destruction and interaction with the environment. Inspired by 90s old school games. Help clear the city of crime and achieve justice. Active ragdoll and destruction are the best friends of beat em up games!

name: Ultimate Destruction Simulator
description: Physics-based simulator that features realistic destruction through, shatter physics, soft body, real time fluid simulation, structural integrity, and much more! Create Custom Liquids with unique properties and build environments with the Scene Editor!

name: Foklor
description: Build, farm, tame, fight and explore as you and your friends survive in the world of Foklor. Discover treasures, items and magic of great power as you defend against evil creatures. Your legend awaits!

name: Inu's Adventure
description: Inu's adventure is a fun platformer where you play a dog against robots, lasers, missiles, platforms, squeaky toys, and a mad robot professor to get out of a secret laboratory.

name: Sword & Shield Simulator
description: When war overtakes your people, it leaves a cruel imprint in the form of hard sacrifice and the crushing of the village. And here you are on the battlefield, confused and distraught, looking for any way to help your people win the battle. But what can you do if you're a simple craftsman?

name: Nvwa
description: Nvwa is a Sci-Fi Strategy Game. Explore an unknown galaxy, discover alien civilization relic and incredible giants, make creatures to help you terraform the planets.

name: Probably Tuesday
description: The story of Probably Tuesday focuses on detective called Robert Lovell going around yet another typical tuesday (probably). Then suddenly he gets contacted by femme fatale called Anne Gony. So Robert takes his pistol maria and our suspenseful story begins.. Where will this journey take Robert?

name: Mistmoon Falls
description: Mistmoon Falls is an open world murder mystery set in a farm-sim town that's now sans farmer. Question the locals, use tools to uncover clues, and sift through some sinister goings-on to find the killer. Choices matter, and who to arrest is up to you—all you need is proof.

name: Castle Dornstein
description: A gothic mystery adventure game, Castle Dornstein follows Hemlock, a young scholar hired to translate a mysterious medieval book. When the book goes missing, everyone becomes a suspect and Hemlock must explore a castle where secrets hide in the shadows and a dark history waits to be discovered.

name: Monsters of the North
description: A Turn-based monster battling roguelite in a world that is ending. Choose attacks, level up and recruit monsters who befriend each other. Don't let your friends die.Strategise and train your team's strengths for the final battle. Maybe you can save everyone in the end.

name: The Pale
description: Congratulations, you got the job! You're the new keeper for the lighthouse on the Pale, an abandoned island off the coast of Maine. Unlock the mysteries of the island's dark past in this 90s inspired survival-horror!

name: Roswell's Journey
description: Explore, fight, upgrade yourself, and discover secrets to help gain allies in hopes to stop the destruction of your home world in this Open World Platformer.

name: Noclipped
description: Noclipped is a Survival Horror Adventure game located in the Backrooms. Explore infinite levels, collect resources, fight or flee from dangerous beings and survive in the harsh environments of the Backrooms.

name: Not Your Mama's Autobattler
description: Invite your friends, build your team and prepare for battle.

name: Two Sisters
description: Witness the obscure scenario of a massacre, in the shoes of the photographer Bárbara, who received an unusual proposal: To photograph a village with bizarre secrets from decades ago.

name: Yuma Will Burn
description: Yuma Will Burn is a narrative indie game where you play as a doctor in desperate circumstances. Left to die in a cave, you must find ways to survive in an uncaring world. Harsh survival mechanics will lead you to earnestly experience triage, poverty, and fear.

name: The Gummiest Bear Challenge
description: It's a physics based 3D platformer where you race against time. Try to get the best time possible by completing fun/challenging levels. You control a jelly-like bear (that is part of the challenge) and you have to roll & jump to get you through the levels that are filled with some obstacles.

name: Extract Me
description: A fully hand-crafted Run N Gun action game. Like Crash Bandicoot but with murder!

name: Zombielantis
description: You play as zombie or human. Real players only, no artificial intelligence. Epic open world multiplayer first-person shooter. Be part of massive teams clashing together, fighting for dominance in a beautiful tropical island setting far away from civilization where only the best survive. Let's bite!

name: Rogue Weapon
description: Roguelite replayability meets FPS action in Rogue Weapon as you clear enemy outposts and try to escape your captors. Whether you do so quietly or with pure chaos is up to you.

name: Zid Journey
description: Zid Journey is a hand-drawn adventure game with a strong, classic 90's vibe. Play as Zid, a yellow dinosaur, and point-and-click his way as he goes on a journey to find the lost parents of a small Daspletosaurus hatchling!

name: Rat Royal
description: Play as a rat and compete or cooperate with other players in different game modes.

name: Sky Mammoths
description: Sky Mammoths takes place in a dystopian future where your only chance for survival is to raid freighters that carry essential resources controlled by monopolies. Save yourself and others by hunting 'Sky Mammoths' and redistributing the stolen resources.

name: The Retrieval
description: THE spaceship Prometheus has re-emerged after being lost for over 200 years. It's not responding to our calls or emitting any signals. The mission is simple: dock in, try to make contact with the crew and if not possible, learn what happened and leave.

name: MiniWarfare
description: MiniWarfare is a stylized tactical third-person shooter where two military outposts battle to take control of all nuclear access codes needed to wipe out the enemy team. Explore the island, loot, trade, complete tasks, and collect airdrops to obtain better gear and give your team a major advantage.

name: Parkdens
description: Parkdens is a minimalistic and relaxing nature park building game where you can place tiles and choose variety of objects ranging from statues, sitting areas, shelters to bushes, playgrounds, trees etc. to populate the placed tiles.

name: Elysia
description: Elysia is a physics-based dodgeball multiplayer where players can slap, tackle and throw dodgeballs at their opponents in an attempt to score more goals than the opposition and win the game! If you're not too late, switch to the goal keeper and attempt to save the goals before they go in. Good Luck!

name: The Creation of Sylebrium
description: Take a leap into the deep fantasy world and its history before Sylebrium. In your journey, the task is to collect all 7 petals from orchid from every one of 7 kingdoms of children of Amun. Succeed and light shall prevail, if not, the new path shall be forged for the 7 kingdoms of Earth.

name: Rallygator
description: Rallygator is a physics based platforming game, in which you control a multi-functional ever transforming monster truck! Solve clever puzzles and do tricky stunts while you're at it!

name: Construction Manager
description: Short: Oversee a construction site, manage workers, construction materials and machines to successfully complete profitable projects.

name: Lotus Knight
description: Lotus Knight is a 2D platform action game. A girl born from a lotus, following the call of her "mother", adventuring inside the world covered with flowers, exploring various interesting places, engaging in intense battles and experiencing a wonderful story.

name: Maiden Gear
description: Maiden Gear : Dynamic Visual Novel crossed with Strategic Roguelike Shooter! Currently in development, Maiden Gear strives to combine the two into a singular unique experience. Beautiful robot maids, deadly weapons, authority in dystopia -- What if all things could be remade?

name: Spin Puzzle
description: A casual and amusing puzzle that consists of spinning the pieces to correctly assemble the pictures. Be quick and arrange all the pieces before the time runs out.

name: Class Zero Seven
description: Class Zero Seven is a third person brawler that tells the story of a wide nation fight against substance abuse. Play as Rin, a newly transferred student with a mysterious background among her peers. Stand off against the Rivalry Gangs and the looming threat of The Wicked Children.

name: World War II: Underground
description: In this first person stealth game you play the role of a partisan in a Nazi occupied Europe. Steal documents, blow up bridges, sabotage factories and more. Use your wit and a set of make-shift tools to accomplish your goals. Become the Underground Soldier of the Second World War.

name: Kamyla and the Scarlet Mage
description: Kamyla and the Scarlet Mage is a story-driven action platformer game. Help Kamyla fight diverse adversaries and find her purpose in life by exploring the world, locating her memories and facing tough challenges in fast action-driven boss fights.

name: Eyes of the Storm
description: "Eyes of the Storm" is a third-person arcade-style racing game that invites players to race, jump and perform stunts on hoverbikes in an open world. By manipulating the hoverbike in the air, the player can perform tricks and earn points and coins.

name: Midwintar
description: Midwintär is a narrative-driven stealth-action inspired by medieval horror folklore that combines careful tactical planning with fast-paced arcade execution and innovative gossip mechanics. Play as a werewolf, a vampire, and a moon witch - to exact your revenge on a vicious religious cult.

name: Garden of the Mind
description: You're in charge of managing a garden. Planting new plants and de-weeding any pesky weeds that show up. The catch is that this garden happens to reside within somebody's mind. Your work will improve their mental health.

name: Battlefield Cell
description: During the pandemic, would you be curious about how our bodies react to the virus? Are you wondering: "What' is autoimmunity?" "All definitions and thesis of the immunology are too hard to understand!" Don't be afraid! After beating the game, you get all the necessary information and fun!

name: Spellpowder: Uprising
description: Spellpowder: Uprising is an upcoming strategy RPG set in fantasy steampunk setting. Lead your squad to victory trough wide streets, dark forests and cold snow lands. Level up, equip, promote your troops and lead them carefully (or not) in upcoming battles.

name: Cyrano
description: Write love letters and cross swords in a one hour adaptation of the classic play: Cyrano de Bergerac!

name: The Rat Plague
description: The Rat Plague is a platform adventure game, which combines modern design concepts with the visual effects of the console in the 1990s.

name: Spaceward Cosmic Conflict
description: Spaceward Cosmic Conflict is a space combat simulator of fast-paced, action packed space battles; set in the future of an alternate history.

name: Streets of Chaos
description: Streets of Chaos is a new retro sidescroller beat em up (fighting game), made with pixelart similar to 16 bits consoles. Is highly based on Streets of Rage, Double Dragon, Final Fight, and Cadillacs and Dinosaurs, with original story and various homages to classics.

name: Jump-Jump
description: 2D platform action games By jumping up and climbing the platform, picking up props can revive dead players and keep invincible and fly up for a distance Accumulate scores over time, and the floor will continue to accelerate upward The game can be played jointly by two people

name: Whisky Bottler
description: Learn the magic of whisky. Discover the aromas in old barrels. Visit Scottish distilleries, get to know their secrets, and start your own in the future. Create your own exceptional whisky. Find out whether you can be successful on the luxurious liquor market. Become a whisky bottler!

name: The Last Defender
description: Set in the merciless blizzards of a far off planet, The Last Defender is a cooperative third-person survival shooter with strategic defence and crafting elements. Nurture your colonists, build your defences and prepare for an enemy that adapts and learns your weaknesses. No wave is ever the same.

name: Hometown Hero
description: A cute, casual turn-based combat game where you'll fight with foam swords and protect your new hometown while exploring its secrets and building your reputation.

name: Doge Trader
description: Ultimate Crypto Trading Rougelite. Get involved in trading big-time and become a crypto whale, or rather a dog

name: Sleepytime Village
description: To learn how to be an adult you have to act like a kid. Sleepytime Village is a narrative adventure that tells the story of a neglectful, workaholic father who becomes trapped in a children’s storybook reality, using the classic point & click interface can you guide Rufus home?

name: ItsyRealm
description: Explore, craft, and fight your way past cute horrors to discover the secrets of The Empty King in the zany world of ItsyRealm.

name: Platfuzzles
description: Platfuzzles is a game with short levels where you need to figure out how to reach your powers and use them to get to the goal. It's a platformer with puzzle elements. Jump, dash, pound, shoot, turn invisible and slow down objects to achieve victory!

name: Drug Lord Simulator
description: Production, dealing, and most importantly, raking in the big money. Drug Lord Simulator puts you in the front-row seat to a drug deal gone bad. With everything lost, you now have to make your way back to the top, starting with virtually nothing. That is, of course, if you survive the climb.

name: Soul Slayer
description: Unlock, equip, upgrade and create your build. Combine different elements for their powerful element reactions slaying thousands of enemies. Are you able to defeat all Soul Lords and the Soul King?

name: Tall Poppy 2
description: In this comedy-horror adventure, explore the city of Boots Bay where you must go through hell to discover the reason why Tall Poppy is tormenting you. It's time to put an end to his terror once and for all!

name: Obsidian Legion
description: Embark on a dark journey in this 2D Adventure Game. Rise to the challenge as you fight your way in a land of perils and wonders. Explore the world and collect the tools necessary to overcome the many obstacles set before you. Find the path that leads to the Obsidian Legion.

name: Ideal Nightmare
description: The dreams of the worshippers of an indescribable evil have been fulfilled, cloaked by the shadows survive the nightmare. Customize your arsenal to hunt the dark forces of hell sending them back from where they came from in a body bag. Escape the nightmare or be eternally locked in.

name: Fera Knight
description: Tame Fera, befriend townsfolk, and restore your honour in this story-driven monster taming and social sim adventure! In an unforgiving world where Fera fight to the death with no second chances, will your Fera be able to stand their ground?

name: Portal Walk
description: Portal Walk is incredible pixel platformer about an adventure between worlds with action events and challenging bosses.

name: Point Rescue Arcade
description: A retro styled on-rails, light gun shooter. Play as Agent Red fighting crime through the bright and colourful City 2. Choose between arcade and dynamic mode, offering fresh experiences on repeated playthroughs.

name: Rusty Rangers
description: Rusty Rangers is an incredible roguelite action platformer adventure. Challenge the insidious Baron von Gasenstein, who plunged everything around into chaos. Fight his henchmen to bring justice to the ever-changing worlds and stop the villain!

name: Chesslands
description: Chesslands is a turn based tactics game where you train chess pieces with 4 unique abilities each and deploy them into battleground to win your opponent.

name: Cities Restored
description: Cities Restored is a simulation strategy game about restoring abandoned cities. As Mayor, you must rebuild each house and place families in them to get your city moving. Upgrade families, beautify the landscape, restore the infrastructure and whatever you do, keep your citizens happy at all costs!

name: Veil of Maia
description: Help Otu, a humble warrior monk, save a world consumed by fear in this heart-wrenching Metroidvania. Slash, cast, and use telekinesis to defeat disillusioned enemies and conquer epic boss battles! Transcend through dozens of hand-crafted trials to overcome fear itself and lift the Veil of Maia.

name: Neon Cyber Samurai
description: Neon Cyber Samurai is a survival game with roguelite elements set in a futuristic world dominated by aliens. Shoot and slash down hordes of foes, steal their weapons, use them to upgrade your Samurai and become an unstoppable force that not even the strongest creatures in this dimension could match.

name: Furniture Busters
description: Furniture Busters is a Survival Horror Game about escaping your friend's house and fighting Monsters made of Furniture. Play against Five types of Furniture with unique AI each.

name: Chopmania
description: Chopmania is a relaxing RPG, where you drive a harvester to cut your way through overgrown forests. Reclaim humanity's land, after Earth fought back deforestation and engulfed it in plants! Uncover the mysteries and save humanity!

name: Twelfth Life
description: Twelfth Life is a visual novel in the genre of shounen-ai. Classmates Tyler and Jean have supernatural abilities that can help them resist the mysterious ghosts haunting the boys.

name: The Last Roman Village 2
description: The story takes place in Ariminum - the last roman village left. After years of peaceful life, General Crassus and all the villagers will face evil forces that will try to destroy everyone and everything in their path. Defend, conquer, build or train soldiers - everything is in your hands.

name: The Revival
description: The Revival is a story-based,basic action First-Person Shooter game which is set in the near future and in an infected world. Play through the battle as a well-trained mercenary fighting on his own against his deadly competitors.

name: Nazralath: The Fallen World
description: Nazralath: The Fallen World is a story-driven, dark fantasy game inspired by the works of Zdzisław Beksiński; focusing on a compelling narrative and exploration through a rich, strong sense of atmosphere.

name: Ray & Stoic Gronk
description: A techno-fantasy adventure brimming with eclectic characters, pulse-pounding platforming, and brutal combat. Discover secrets, solve puzzles, and conquer intimidating foes - each more deadly than the last.

name: House of Pain
description: House of Pain is a brutal hack and slash platformer. Battle hordes of twisted gore-encrusted mutant enemies. Explore, fight and wield deadly weapons such as the chainsaw, axe, machete and flame thrower. Avoid deadly traps while surviving the terror legions of twisted monsters and huge creatures.

name: Incoming War
description: Incoming War is a vehicle simulator with builder and RTS elements where you take on the role of a commander for one of two warring robot factions. Sit at the controls of units that you recruit in the buildings which you construct. Fight for survival by expanding your base!

name: Green Hawk Down
description: Green Hawk Down is an action-packed, multi-player FPS that allows you to fight in the smallest army in the world! Team up with other plastic toy soldiers and wage war against other teams for control of the kitchen, bedroom or back yard!

name: Luxworks
description: Luxworks is a choice focused game about keeping a lonely rabbit company. Come in once a day in real-time and see how your choices effect how your relation develops over time.

name: Is Land of Mysterious
description: Fate throws you into an mysterious island adventure! Try to survive a perilous voyage across mysterious Island! Build your own home, solve a puzzles and gets more trophy but be wary! You will need a lot of effort to survive.

name: One Drunken Knight
description: One Drunken Knight is a "pee-zle" platformer where you need to drink to gain special powers and stay alive...

name: Chased Around the World
description: Travel the world as a thief collecting money bags or play as the police gathering clues to locate the thief.

name: Dominay
description: The new PvPvE. Win the match by completing missions or fighting the enemy team in the forest. Welcome to Dominay, a game of adventure, action, and strategy like you've never played before. Choose your Advantage, find your weapons and items, and fulfill quests in the forest. PLAY FOR FREE

name: The Great
description: Living in the big city with a lot of people. Somebody are friend who supports you. Somebody are not and wants to threatens you or other. Life is not easy. Criminals are not mercy. How you can survive and protect your friends with your hand and your mystery power.

name: Zombie Spree: The Dawn
description: Zombie Spree: The Dawn is a perfect game if you want to relax after a tough day, shoot some zombies and turn them into a pile of blood using a large variety of weaponry. No need to move and jump around like a goof, just aim and shoot!

name: Seabed Frog
description: A turn-base-strategy game of physical collision

name: Hermit: an Underwater Tale
description: Underwater, a new threat slowly emerges. Playing as a helpless hermit crab, use your shells to defeat countless waves of monsters and giant sea creatures in this action packed 2d game.

name: Rocketeer
description: This is a small arcade game in which you are a skilled pilot and you have to complete all levels. Use your arrows to move around, and avoid collisions. Shoot the destroyable meteorites for extra points! Every level has its own high score, try to beat it!

name: Ferrule Instincts
description: You’re Kayla Ferrule - And your birthday is in a week. However, your friend Miles Hector got in with some bad apples. Can you outsmart everyone and make it to your 20th in one piece? Test your instincts in this brief interactive adventure based on Yellow Optic’s Fool Me Twice.

name: Reflections Path
description: Start your journey, visit interesting places, and find out answers to fantastic mysteries. Travel through foothills, forests, mountains and more, in this adventure-filled, turn-based fantasy RPG

name: Fighter X Fighter
description: Punch and kick! Live in fighting! Choose skills and strengthen talents to conquer various levels and enemies.

name: Steel Tower Swordmaster
description:
Steel Tower Swordmaster is a combat-focused sword-fighting RPG. Immersed in a world of ruin and decay, discover stories of those who fight for power or struggle for survival across the towers.

Every fight requires skilled manoeuvring as you attack, dodge, hide, grapple and throw foes off bridges. Your decisions have an impact – play with empathy or malice. Each player’s experience is entirely their own.

name: Haunted House Renovator
description: Get ready to fight evil entities that roam in abandoned houses! Become the world's first paranormal renovator and set off to restore haunted mansions to their former glory. Make sure that the houses you work on look pleasing to your customers... even if you have to hide a few skeletons in a closet.

name: The Silent Islands
description: THE SILENT ISLANDS, is a survival, horror game where you'll need to find essential items and fight your way to the General to put an end to the nightmare.

name: Friendly Warfare
description: Friendly Warfare adds pixel figures and violence to board games! Inspired by the German board game "Mensch ärgere dich nicht" ("Don't get angry"), this game brings weapons to the table to emphasize your anger!

name: Forebears
description: A coming of age visual novel adventure about forest spirits, family heritage and a story of undying love.

name: The Few
description: The simulator of the Road to financial freedom, players will start as a college graduate entering the society, through work, investment, passive income and other ways to improve financial, family and physical and mental health, to achieve financial freedom. Help him push the wheels of his fate.

name: Qorena
description: Sin descripción

name: Get the Ball Rolling
description: A single player ball rolling adventure/platformer with puzzles, powerups, physics, portals and gravity flips. Get the Ball Rolling!

name: Wizard Man
description: It's Wizard Man versus the powerful leaders and fighting forces of the world! An epic fantasy land awaits, full of ferocious monsters conjured by an evil warlock through wrongfully performed experiments with dark magic. Will he succeed? You're in control!

name: Magna Regna
description: Magna Regna combines nostalgy of classic medieval RTS genre with modern look and gameplay. Explore medieval history thorough various campaigns from 7th century up to the very last time of knights. Play with your battle-hardened friends against others in multiplayer.

name: Nona's Game
description: An online game of challenges, fragile alliances and betrayal for up to 12 players. Escape elimination through diplomacy or deceit! The last remaining player wins.

name: Under a Rock
description: A procedural open-world survival craft game for 1-10 players. Explore a primitive but dangerous place with a different evolutionary path; here, wildlife is oversized, Neanderthals still exist, and curses are real.

name: Pugg
description: Pugg is a free-to-play game that simulates future life in a third-person perspective.

name: Tyrone vs Cops VR
description: Awaken the latent power of your melanin and kill cops in this thought-provoking game on police brutality in America... Now in highly immersive first-person VR, and with all new gameplay mechanics!

name: Leave a Light
description: Alone in the darkened manor, terrible secrets wait to be brought to light. Discover the clues to your family's past, and search for supplies that may help you survive what lurks in the shadows.

name: Pluvia: Episode II
description: The adventures of Bruno and Amina continue. In this second part lots of minigames and twists and turns.

name: Drill Dash
description: Inspired by old school arcade shooters, mixed with roguelike elements, Drill Dash is set in a post-apocalyptic world where mech-equipped drillers are launched from railgun platforms into a vast environment full of destructive raiders, haywire robots and mutated locals.

name: Country Champs
description: Match up against other players and compete in many exciting, fast-paced games. Jump and dash to the top and show off your skills by earning trophies and unlocking rare skins.

name: Star Commander: The Sentinel
description: Solve the mystery of your hidden past as you traverse the galaxy in this epic Sci-Fi point and click adventure.

name: Fire & Maneuver: American Civil War
description: Preserve the Union or break way as the Confederacy in the first expansion to The Armchair Historian's Fire & Maneuver. Recreate The War Between the States or pit America against Europe in radical matchups!

name: Train Simulator: Western Pacific GP20 High Nose Loco
description: The Electro-Motive GP20 was designed to satisfy the railroads’ 1960s demands for ever-more horsepower. In a production run lasting from November 1959 to April 1962, the EMD GP20 came to symbolize both the beginnings of the “second generation” of North American dieselization and the “horsepower race” of the early 1960s.

name: Suffocate
description: Suffocate is a first-person horror survival game. The story takes place in modern Taiwan and combines family, religion, politics and other elements; avoid the chasing of spirits in the mansion, seeking the unbearable memories and truth while exploring the environment.

name: Otherworld Legends: Jadetalon
description:
This content requires the base game Otherworld Legends on in order to play.

A feisty battlemaiden with a petite build and uncanny brawn who mows down enemies with graceful sweeps of her prodigious glaive. She is apparently the co-owner of a strange mirror that grants passage to a number of different worlds, and has falled into the illusory realm created by Asurendra during a training tour alongside her sister.

name: Wild Delivery
description: The old-style-cooking-simulator-delivery game!

name: Mimpi Dreams: Lunapark
description: What could be harder than finding a lost baby in the amusement park? Catching that baby! Because it is simply not ready to go home yet. Impossible task? Sound like a job for a hero...

name: Trainz Plus: Pro Train - DB BR Class 85 001
description: This DLC features the DB BR85 001 in PBR quality with a high quality interior. The Class 85 was intended for hauling passenger and goods trains. They were however also employed as pusher locomotives on the Hoellentalbahn in the Black Forest.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Random Animals 2
description: Puzzles of random animals!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Pro Train - DB BR Class 85 001
description: This DLC features the DB BR85 001 in PBR quality with a high quality interior. The Class 85 was intended for hauling passenger and goods trains. They were however also employed as pusher locomotives on the Hoellentalbahn in the Black Forest.

name: Miner Ultra Adventures 2: Illuminati Trail
description: This is season 2 of our ultra adventure, brave many extremely difficult 3d platformer levels in search of the truth of the universe.

name: Lich Queen's Curse
description: An interactive fiction role-playing game. With a non-linear story line, your choices determine how the story plays out. Recruit allies to join your party, form relationships with party members, and even find romance. Will you choose a path of light? Or a path of darkness?

name: Nightclub Manager: Violet Vibe
description: Become a nightclub mogul in an immersive first-person club manager simulator. Open your venue: decorate it, hire bouncers and dancers, choose the music. Interact with your patrons, mix drinks, and react when things get rough!

name: Wild West Builder
description: Build the Old West towns and connect them with railroads! Explore the dead land of American desert and bring it to life. Build your own town from scratch- take care of your people, gather resources and expand the railroad network.

name: Community College Hero: All Things End
description: The thrilling conclusion to your heroic journey! The Manipulator has destroyed the Speck campus, forcing you and your friends to flee the only home you’ve known. Can you survive the challenges of a new school while preparing for the ultimate showdown against the world’s most powerful villains?

name: Hungaz: Epic Minigames
description: Hungaz is an online multiplayer party game with up to 70 players, where you either in a team with friends or free-for-all struggle through several rounds of challenging and unique mini-games until the last hunga or team standing. Do you have what it takes to be proclaimed the true Hungaz champion?

name: Empyrean Scout
description: Maneuver your scout corvette through a wonderous but hostile domain. Abuse its superior agility to grind enemies for gear and XP, empowering you to venture further. Empyrean Scout is a space combat Action-RPG, built from the ground up for VR.

name: Sanguinite
description: Sanguinite is a lunar-lander-meets-twin-stick-shooter action game with elements of resource management and exploration. Equip your remote drones and explore the dangerous surface of distant worlds. Bring resources and artifacts back to your ship. Investigate the origin of the aliens you encounter.

name: Mad Massacre
description: Fight your way through hordes of mutants and arm yourself with powerful weapons. Monster mayhem!

name: Sang: The Desert Blade
description: Sang: The Desert Blade is a Souls-like Action RPG, inspired by Dark Souls and The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past, where you explore, fight, overcome challenges and defeat terrifying bosses in the unforgiving world of Zemsluna. Follow the story of Sang as she looks for her long lost kin.

name: The Saragossa Manuscript
description: Solve matters of honor. Romance remarkable people. Outwit pushy specters.... In a story-rich roguelite, where you manage character traits and relationships, co-authoring an emerging tale of passion, swash and demonic influences.

name: Ghostkin Capers
description: Who could possibly spook the spooker? Feign your bravery as you uncover the secrets that lie in the haunted Manor; on an ultimate quest to help two boys.

name: MindVenture
description: Join a group of explorers and go on an adventure! Play, discover and create your own adventures to share with your friends.

name: Cult of the Sons
description: Several young women were abducted in a London park. They have not been found again. Now the population is afraid that a serial killer is on the loose in London. It was rumoured that Jack the Ripper was back.

name: Castle Manager
description: You have been given control of the castle. You must make sure that your ruler - the king - is satisfied with the progress of your work. You will have a lot of different duties, which will be systematically accounted for by the king! Don't let the kingdom fall!

name: Day of Pixel
description: Top Down open World/ 2D Platformer Wild west, Farm, Restaurant, Explore, Shoot!

name: Pulsar Crash
description: Pulsar Crash takes the white-knuckle gameplay of twin-stick shooters and combines it with the competitive spirit of fighting games.

name: Heredity: The Eternal Curse
description: Massacre your way through endless hordes of genetic monstrosities, absorb the blood of the fallen to inherit their abilities, and never stop moving lest they rebirth to repay the favor. Succeed and you might just uncover the truth behind the curse that is eternal life.

name: Shido's World
description: Explore an amazing world with the Shido and learn a little more about our history. Many adventures, beautiful places and remarkable stories await you in the Shido's World

name: Guidance
description: A survival horror game about spirit possession. Explore an abandoned village as Velvet, a golden-ager in search for his lost wife. Talk to spirits through possessed sightseers, keep the angry ones in check with your tranquilizer gun, and try not to think about those blackouts you’re having.

name: The Collector's Legends
description: A deck-building RPG roguelite with lots of loot, deep interactive mechanics, and extensive character and card customizations.

name: Endless Melody: The Symphony of Angels
description: Follow Fighter, a regular guy who finds himself caught up in world changing events as he learns about friendship, love, and about himself. His sister, Amicia, a young girl with a tragic past searching for the answer to everyone’s big questions: “Where do I come from?” & “Where do I go from here?”

name: Jumalien
description: The great Jumalien tournament enters its final phase, only the god of gods will emerge victorious. Embody a deity and hunt down your opponents to receive the supreme sacrament in this local multiplayer hack & slash!

name: Snow Problem
description: A retro puzzle game with 100 levels ranging from easy to mind-bending, plus a built-in level editor to create your own brain-teasers.

name: Adult VR Game Room
description: Adult VR Game Room is a game in which you manage a research laboratory equipment and resources. Breed unique ACTORS (Artificial Cell Transmutable Organic Robots). Interact with them, control them, become them. Meet other players and their creations in an online Multiplayer.

name: Ghost Ship
description: In Ghost Ship, you become an epidemic expert aboard the quarantined cruise ship, stranded in the open seas. No port will offer you shelter, as an unknown virus wreaks havoc among the crew and the passengers. Your job is to save their lives, but also save the world in the long run.

name: Jump Among Stars
description: Challenging 3D platform game where you will face a series of increasing challenges. Each level is a thrilling adventure through an intergalactic portal to a new star system to race to the center, collect energy from the stars and return it to the space station.

name: I Can Human
description: A hand-drawn platformer where we play as Thuppel the robot, trying to pass off as a human. Learn emotions using powerups across several mini-stories involving different characters and environments, as we try to reconnect with our friend.

name: False Calamity
description: False Calamity is a dark, 2d, narrative-driven platformer combining challenging puzzles and intense action. Experience the ominous story and immerse yourself in the unsettling atmosphere set after the supposed calamity of the world.

name: Flail Faster
description: Take back a corrupted castle in this difficult Action Roguelite. Jump and strafe around threatening attacks while simultaneously drafting powerful weapons and upgrades. Only those who flail wildly in the face of danger can truly be called heroes.

name: The Cult of Chanseville
description: "The Cult of Chanseville" is an indie suspense/horror game that's inspired by classics of the genre! The game will be released as soon as it's ready!

name: Peaky Circus
description: When The Mime was a kid, his dad and most of his community was killed in a war but luckily his uncle helped him and his mother to escape the town. The mime was hiding in the woods and The Uncle helped them with the food and other essentials, mime is now ready to fight with the murderer of his dad.

name: Daring Academy
description: You move to a new futuristic college in Olis with your best friend, Amelia Sweet, and meet others. Create trust, relationships, explore the deepest parts of Olis, etc. Will you grow close or drift further apart? Welcome to the crazy world of Daring Academy!

name: Veterum
description: Turn-based tactical strategy with a detailed combat system and interactive environment. Explore the open world, complete quests, search for rare artifacts. Lead the last army of the Order of the Gatekeepers and stop the coming chaos!

name: Heartbeats
description: Heartbeats is a visual novel about music, love, relationships, mental health, and more! Features: 4 love interests, choices that affect the story, original music, beautiful art, and multiple endings.

name: Project Worth: Forgather
description: Who will you be when they arrive? Forgather is a 2D Pixel Art Action/Adventure episodic tale that takes place in the capital, Onstaan. Traverse this Lucin plagued city as you battle your way through the STAR's forces until you find out what it means to be Worthy.

name: Hit and Boom
description: Explore the mystical Hit and Boom Arena - A thrilling fusion between MOBA and Battle Royale. Choose your BoomBot, master its abilities, unleash power and grab your loot! Bring your friends for multiplayer action or sling your guns solo...Only the finest of them all survive to the end!

name: Mirage In Darkness
description: A puzzle platformer adventure game. Darkness is coming. A young kid Del tries to find a way to survive in this situation.

name: The Obsessive Shadow
description: The Obsessive Shadow is a VR Survival horror game about fending off a home intruder. Keep yourself safe with nothing but a flashlight and the naked eye...

name: Fogtown: Mystery of the Missing Crime
description: Crime has vanished from the city of Fogtown... or has it? Sherblock and Blockson are on the case to find out where it's all gone, uncovering a deep conspiracy and causing mayhem (in equal measure). A point-and-click puppet-based comedy joyride!

name: The Tideshell Keeper
description: The Tideshell Keeper takes you on a classical point and click adventure, filled with humor and an interesting world with a great ensemble of characters. Learn a strange language and use the mythical tideshell to manipulate the waters around you as you find your way home to save your family.

name: F-Team
description: F-Team is a fantasy turn-based strategy game. Recruit and fully customize heroes. Explore a huge world as you discover locations and uncover quests. Decide which quests to fulfill as you manage your heroes. Engage in tactical turn-based battles against a wide array of enemies.

name: Pirates Bay
description: Pirates Bay is a low poly multiplayer open-world pirate adventure filled with numerous mysteries and discoveries. Become a pirate and go on a journey to search the treasures. Cross endless waters and fight with mystical creatures. All of that and even more awaits you in the world of Pirates Bay!

name: Runeroots
description: Your planet has been destroyed by invaders. Gather, craft, and rebuild your village in your own style. Explore other destroyed planets as you fight back the enemy in tactical turn-based battles. Play solo or up to 4 players in online co-op.

name: Orion's End
description: Orion’s End is space trading life sim. Trading, smuggling, pirate hunting, or pirating. Be a hero or a rogue. But also be a friend - there are residents on each planet who need someone like you to talk to, help them with quests, or to just gift them with loot from your adventures.

name: What Has Come Before
description: What Has Come Before is a perspective-driven puzzle game set in an eerie and stylish black and white Lynchian world. Stuck in limbo with only hearing and vision to guide, players must utilize clever changes in perspective to move forward.

name: SU the Son of Gaia
description: Explore the land of Panacea and its secrets in this vibrant and colorful pixelart Action RPG and help SU in his adventure to recover the balance of the contaminated ecosystems.

name: Don't Stop You'll Die
description: Don't Stop You'll Die is a top-down arena shooter with bullet hell and roguelike elements where if you stop moving you DIE!

name: Lockes the Thief
description: Play a smooth talking, slick walking, stealth sneaking thief and steal for the greater good...and yourself, of course. Use your wits and your hits in this Hip-Hop-Zelda-Like!

name: Heard of the Story?
description: Forge a medieval community with intelligent AI villagers. Gather resources and transform the village into a town, or simply listen to captivating stories from various simulated and evolving lives. All in a beautiful, relaxing, and immersive fantasy world.

name: Lumbah Jump
description: A difficult, pixel art platformer. You can't stop, but can you reach the top?

name: Stellar Propeller
description: Stellar Propeller is a fast-paced, single-player racing game with a variety of worlds, each with its own unique levels.

name: Hunted: Survive the Night
description: Hunted is a first person only asymmetrical multiplayer. 1 killer and up to 4 survivors compete. The Monster has to kill every survivor, and the survivors has to escape by playing 6 haunted music boxes scattered around the map to open the gate to freedom. Every character has their own abilities.

name: Seasons of Courage
description: Seasons of Courage combines action-adventure and base building with soles-like co-op multiplayer combat. Loot powerful gear, destroy challenging bosses, and build bustling towns, together, in Seasons of Courage.
